title: Waste of time
review: Went to see Taragarh fort. It was a bit far from Ajmer town and top of the hill. Driving to this place was fun. Unfortunately the fort is in ruins and only the Dargah exists. It was a complete disappointment.

title: Holy place
review: Dargah hazrat meera syed hussian is nice religious place. peaceful place .good place for visit.try it

title: religious place
review: My first hiking experience. Its worth to do it. Amazing view from the top.

title: not for tourist, a dargah and no fort
review: We went against the advice of the driver, where he said nothing is there, however, we thought there will be a fort, but we can see just a few remains and the only savior was the mist, which made the place quite romantic although it was a dargah

title: Peace...
review: Just great experience to visit here because I love hiking. It is a dargah of Hazrat Meera Syed Hussain.

title: Pilgrimage and a great view
review: Take a shared car taxi from  Dhai din ka Jhopda at ₹80per head and you'll be spared the 3km uphill climb. Anyway, the steps of the trekking toute are steep, often broken in places and lined by beggars and vendors on both sides, in addition to being interspersed with a few minor shrines. The view of the city is quite inspiring. The shrine is located in the historical Taragarh fort complex, very little of which survives today. The shrine itself is a peaceful one, with lot of beliefs associated with it, particularly related to marriage and childbirth. Helpful Khadims lead you around and provide good service.

title: Awesome experiance
review: This is Dargah of Meera Sahib who came before Khawaza Garib Nawaz on his order. It is the place of his sacrifice.

title: VAISHNODEVI TEMPLE, GULBARGA
review: A recently constructed temple. One has to climb steps more than 100 . Though it appears that the steps are steep , we can  easily climb and get down. Of course, the temple authorities are generous and providing LIFT facility to Senior Citizens , patients and children . It is worthy pilgrim center.

title: Place full of touts
review: For middle class people this is not a good place to visit, because they dictate the amount to donate and it's a huge amount that they ask for; and will badmouth you if you don't pay that much.

title: A must place to visit
review: No reviews can accomplish the dream trip to Taragarh fort dargah. Either you can find the sharing taxi or personalise taxi to go Taragarh Dargah. A place on mountain from where you can see the entire Ajmer city while going up or coming down. Even people also walks to Taragarh Dargah from KGN Dargah Sharif.

title: Not a tourist destination
review: Please don't go . If you reach the Top to see Taragarh Fort, it is of no impotence as the fort is in ruins. Free guides take you to the Dargah, saying that, it is a free service on behalf of the Dargah and takes you to Dargah for the prayers. Once the prayer is completed for you, they will demand five hundred rupees as donation. pure cheating.

title: Awesome
review: This  Dargah located on the top of the Taragarh. Dargah of Hazarat Meera Syed Hussain. Taxi to go Taragarh Dargah Or People also walks to go Taragarh Dargah.

title: Masha Allah
review: Great place far on a hill little far from Dargah can be reach there by car or taxi available from Adhai gadhi ka jhopda

title: Good
review: its good pilgrim, just you need to be careful about the people around you they will loot you. Everything is linked with money

title: Must visit during evenings
review: If you don't want to go for spiritual reasons go for the scintillating views of Ajmer city, absolutely nothing beats the experience of seeing the city light up at sunset

title: Great journey to top and excellent birds eye view
review: This shrine is on top of the mountain. You will enjoy hiring a jeep to ride there. Lots of turns climbing up to the shrine. There are people will try to make money out of you- beware of them.

title: On top of taragrah fort
review: Best is to skip the place unless you are too much inclined to visit. On the top of hill the ride is on a steep slope,

title: Great place
review: Dargha of Hazrat meera hussain is situated on the aravali mountain on the top. you can visit by climbing and with jeep as well. from the this place to can view the whole of ajmer...

title: Taragard Fort
review: Syed Meeran Husain (R.A.) - Taragard Fort It is a grand fort, located on a steep hill in south of Dargah Sharif, The height of the hill is 800 ft. During the reignof Rai Pithora, it was a famous and a strong fort and was considered it cannot be conquered. But Sultan Shahabuddin Ghauri conquered it without any difficulty and appointed Syed Meeran Husain (R.A.) as the Garrison Commander (Qiledaar).

title: Beautiful place
review: Hazrat Meera  Hussain's Dargah is beautiful place this is Royal religious place good for everyone must go
